snippet: Greek officials said Friday that a record 1.1 tons of heroin were seized and 11 people arrested east of Athens in a joint operation with the United States Drug Enforcement Administration.
abstract: Greek officials say record 1.1 tons of heroin were seized and 11 people arrested east of Athens in joint operation with United States Drug Enforcement Administration.
lead_paragraph: Greek officials said Friday that a record 1.1 tons of heroin were seized and 11 people arrested east of Athens in a joint operation with the United States Drug Enforcement Administration.
